name: Lady Ice
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS BRIGHT, FLASHING SCENES

"A tense little game that will really make you fear the dark!" - FreeGamePlanet

"Lady Ice marks another people-pleasing entry from Nyar." - HorrorTalk

Experience a bone-chilling, wild-western horror title created by the developer of Asylum Jam 2015's top 5 runner-up - The Room.

Whatever you do... stay out of the dark!
Lady Ice is a local myth, some say she can travel only through darkness and take away poor souls into her Great Storm.

In this first-person horror-survival title, which scored in the Top 5 Games in Asylum Jam 2016, you must avoid the Lady Ice as she envelopes you in darkness with nowhere to run. Keep your candles lit to stay safe, as she cannot reach you in the light. But be wary - she can cast her spell of darkness. During her spell, you cannot light your candles, leaving you vulnerable and lonesome in her dark world.

This title was created in under 48 hours for #asylumjam2016

Keep up with my games here: https://www.facebook.com/nyarrrrr

Developer note: Lady Ice's audio has been optimized for headphones. It's recommended to wear them ;)

Full v1.1 patch notes [here].

If you find any issues with the game, please let me know in the comments :)
